document_data.name: Tormentor
document_data.mainbody: A '''Tormentor''' was a four-wheeled [[infernal war machine]] that could rapidly transport small teams and carry a moderate amount of cargo.
document_data.Description: A Tormentor had four bladed iron wheels. It was designed for raiding and scouting.
document_data.Abilities: The blades of a Tormentor's wheels could damage other vehicles or standing creatures when driving it close to them. It could carry up to {{SI|500|lb|k|long=yes}} in cargo.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Mad Maggie]], a [[night hag]], owned three Tormentors in the garage at [[Fort Knucklebone]].<ref>
* [[Bitter Breath]], a warlord in [[Avernus]], drove a Tormentor that had an [[Infernal Screamer]].<ref>
